title: RIOT idea for a new map!!!
body:
Deathmatch, 10 man. All against all. One flag in the center. Person who holds the flag max wins.

Discuss.

replies.body:
Soraka would be op on this

Also if morgana qs someone everyone piles on them deadly alliance

>Deathmatch

.

>Person who holds the flag max wins.

These are not the same thing.
Clearly u havent played Unreal tournament :D
